website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an end table that will match your rustic, farmhouse decor, this one offers styling and quality that are hard to beat.
pros: Has an unmistakably farmhouse look, thanks to the distressed finish and mesh wire accent doors
Assembly is easy and build is solid
cons: Some reports of missing pieces and damaged parts upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Asleep on the job
customer_reviews.text: Although it was not hard to put together whoever put the stickers on the parts to label them must have been on break. All the labels were just thrown on one piece. Guess it was time to go home that day. Once together it is a nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: DD Crab

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Piece
customer_reviews.text: First, I absolutely loved how easy it was to put this all together. I guess I'm somewhat of a "handy" guy but this still only took me around 20-30 minutes to put it all together. Secondly, I am amazed by the quality of wood that this is made from. Everything is thick, sturdy and smells like real wood pieces. And lastly, I just can't get over the rustic style. I love brand new things that look old so this piece is sure to match with almost any living room set.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Very nice end table!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a large end table to fill a gap between my sectional and the wall. This is really nice and sturdy. It came with all the pieces and nothing was broke. It is sitting on hardwood floors and right now is empty and my only con is that my 3 year is pushing it thru the house. I will need to put some things in it to make it heavier but other than that it looks great. I will be getting the smaller version for the other side of my room.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Took 20 minutes to put together. Everything lined up perfectly and it looks beautiful. Well worth the money, great deal. The color is great for us, which is weathered off white. I love the knotted walnut top as well, but my favorite part of this end table is the black wired doors, they really bring out the piece and they close tight and line up perfectly. If we needed one more, I’d buy another. There’s also a beautiful coffee table that goes with it for a great price, would make a beautiful set, but don’t need that either.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Table
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to put a small fish tank on. The stand is very cute and sturdy. It was easy to assemble by myself. My husband and I liked it so much, we bought another one to match.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: The two screws to attach the cabinet door knobs were not included and we could not match the threads to any screws at Home Depot. We contacted Amazon for assistance. The representative did call three times but the first time she tried to connect with Ashley furniture, the call was after their business hours. The second time I was still at work and was unable to be on the call. The third time, she placed me on hold while she tried to contact Ashley furniture. I was on hold for over 25 minutes and had to hang up. I have not heard back from customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction - Excellent Finish - Easy to Build
customer_reviews.text: Everything lined up tight and square with accurately centered dowels. Screwing in the allen bolts was a breeze. The result is a solid, excellently finished product that far exceeded expectations for an "assembly required" product! I bought the coffee table and two end tables. Based on the quality, I followed up with two Ashley Signature by Design lamps. I hope they meet the same standards. SUPER value for the money. Very classy in the "shabby chic" or farmhouse style.
customer_reviews.author: alboma05

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Rustic end table
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love the look and feel of this table. It is perfect in my room, nice sized with good storage. I bought the white with brown top and it compliments the Ashley coffee table very well. I am pretty handy with furniture assembly and this piece was a mess. The instructions were fine l, but several of the predrilled holes did not match up. It was a little frustrating (and the Ashley coffee table was frustration free by comparison). I got it together and it is sturdy, but the assembly should have been much smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda J Exline

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, one had to be jury rigged in order to finish assembly. Now they don’t even sell the same color so if I want a replacement I might as well shop somewhere else that has the item still in stock. Terrible experience from Ashley Furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton  Kruse

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on shipping 2 times
customer_reviews.text: Really nice table for the price. I ordered it and it came damaged. Replaced it and the second one came damaged too. It’s a shame, I really liked it. But not worth the aggravation of trying again.
customer_reviews.author: primalkate

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase & delivery
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this and table! It goes great with the other pieces in my familyroom. Initially I made the mistake of ordering this piece from another source; it was back ordered for months...I wound up canceling that order and I decided to go through Amazon and received the table within three days of my order I couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Schneider

customer_reviews.title: End tables
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find these end tables on here rather than having to buy them at Ashley Furniture. I was skeptical at first but they were perfect and matched my cocktail table!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Living room
customer_reviews.text: Have to give it great credit Lady’s and gents👌 Bought matching end table and sofa table to match I’m so impressed! B
customer_reviews.author: Bernard corbett

customer_reviews.title: Great look and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We love this table it matches a kitchen island we have. In our open concept living - kitchen area it pulls everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Gates

customer_reviews.title: Adorable end tables!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love , love my end tables! Just what I was looking for. I love the doors! They are very sturdy and very easy to put together. No complaints! Would look great with any farmhouse look! Wish they weren’t as pricy but these will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Agbegley

customer_reviews.title: Love this end table
customer_reviews.text: love these end tables. Matches my entertainment center perfectly. Extremely fast delivery. Ordered on Thursday and had it by Saturday. Will order from company again. Arrived in perfect condition and so easy to assemble. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect side table/cabinet for me. I needed a space to keep crocheting projects when the Grands visit and this is exactly what I was looking for. It's an attractive way to stash my creative clutter:)
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Its large, sturdy and absolutely beautiful. Favorite end table and chair table set ever. It can hold a insane amount of stuff inside too, my 2 year old filled it with her toys, she loved it. Very classy way to hide toys in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to make modifications!
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet doors would not line up. My husband had to redrill and move things around. Nails sticking out too that could have been very dangerous. They look nice now but we should not have had to do all that.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced given quality
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging, no damage. Easy to assemble and no parts missing. Only the top of the table is real wood, but the table is sturdy and it looks nice. I feel it's overpriced given the quality, therefore why I'm giving the lower rating.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Simple and fast. Fair price. Good quality. Extra storage space.
customer_reviews.author: enrico laudato

customer_reviews.title: Large top
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what we needed. We like the extra large top.
customer_reviews.author: dclandis

customer_reviews.title: Good storage space
customer_reviews.text: I like the end table but discovered cracks and scratches as I was assembling. Too heavy to box & return.
customer_reviews.author: Lez Q.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value
customer_reviews.text: What a great heavy duty end table. For the price, it’s everything I wanted and more. Easy to assemble and move into place. Great value, so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality product. Easy to put together and real wood!!! I found a great price on Amazon with these tables.
customer_reviews.author: Montanagirllovesmakeup

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this little table. It is not as deep as a typical end table, so check the size.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and it's a value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Ryan rugenstein

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table! It goes perfect with my decor and I added the matching end tables as well.
customer_reviews.author: KelliannRN

customer_reviews.title: Just follow the directions that all you need 😁
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble took us about 30 minutes on each oneI we ordered the set ....
customer_reviews.author: laurajohnkoski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2, they were easy to put together. I love the storage room, perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.author: vicki green

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product! Easy to put together and quality was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Peeples

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Tables came well packaged and earlier than expected! Easy to put together. They were exactly what I was hoping they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice piece of furniture. Great value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Loved how sturdy it was and bigger then I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made and much more sturdy than most of the furniture that I've bought online. It was also pretty easy to put together, installation took about 15 minutes. I'm using this one as a nightstand in my bedroom and plan on getting a couple more for my living room. It's fairly large and roomy with plenty of space inside for books and or photo albums. Update: After trying white/brown end tables that I received for review I went ahead and purchased two of the black ones for my living room. The price, as well as the quality, was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: As with every piece of Ashley furniture that we have received, this arrived with a broken piece. We were still able to put it together. It seems otherwise sturdy and looks great. We plan to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Oceania

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley - Valebeck Rectangular Storage End Table, Black/Brown
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteDouble take. Sporting a two-tone finish that pairs a distressed vintage white with aged natural pine color, this end table elevates the art of rustic farmhouse living. Enhancing its charm: shelved storage visible through cabinet doors with inset metal grills.
feature_bullets: CASUAL END TABLE: The storage space makes this side table the perfect embodiment of beauty and practicality in your home. Distressed with a reclaimed look, it'll entice everyone
HANDSOMELY CRAFTED: Table is made of veneers, wood and engineered wood in a distressed finish. Designed with a double door cabinet with metal grills and hardware and a center shelf
RUSTIC APPEAL: Between the plank effect styling, visible shelf storage through the metal grills and two-tone finish, this modern table amplifies farmhouse in your home paired with a plant or lamp
SMALL SPACE SOLUTION: Measuring 24" W x 26" D x 27" H, this table looks great set by a living room sofa or in narrow spaces such as an entryway or hallway
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions and hardware included. Screwdriver (not included) is needed for full assembly

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars124 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
